attributes.action: Because of gross over population family allowance should only be paid for the first two children.  If religious beliefs force couples to have more than 2 children then the appropriate religions should fund any further children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Because of over population family allowance should only be paid for the first two children.  If couples are forced to reproduce more than two children then the appropriate religions should be responsible for funding further children.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
